BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #18362 from rhatdan/quadlet Support systemd optional prefix '-' for devices.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: windows: podman save allow the use of stdout By default podman save tries to write to /dev/stdout, this file doe snot exists on windows and cannot be opened. Instead we should just use fd 1 in such case. [NO NEW TESTS NEEDED] Fixes #18147 Signed-off-by: Paul Holzinger <pholzing@redhat.com>
